bug.author: StefanoSamele
bug.description: Looking into the ReshapePreprocessor I noticed that there is a strict equality involving two different arrays of int (line 87). Shouldn't be a check on the shapes i.e. the content of the two arrays?

comments.comment: Yes, that was a bug. Fixed here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/commit/ed975f452e18079b13f32258509cfe7099c1c799>deeplearning4j@ed975f4</denchmark-link>
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
